text: in mushrikon (mishranavaadiyon) kee koee sandhi allaah aur usake rasool ke paas kaise ho sakatee hai? unake sivaay jinase tumane sammaanit masjid (kaaba) ke paas sandhi[1] kee thee. to jab tak ve tumhaare lie seedhe rahen, to tum bhee unake lie seedhe raho. vaastav mein, allaah aagyaakaariyon se prem karata hai
